item.description: 50’s, 60’s, 70’s DANCE at Nuchie’s, Bristol from 8 pm to 12 am. Enjoy the sounds of this fabulous music. Remember listening to the oldies? This is going to be a blast! There will be a delicious buffet from 8 to 9:30 pm for everyone to enjoy. DJ D&J Productions, dress casual, and door prizes. Admission $15. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions to 164 Central Street: I-84 to Exit 33 (Rt. 72W), go to end about 1.5 miles, turn right, at 2nd light facility on right.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside at the admission table.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles 50's, 60's, 70's Dance
